content.text:
[@greg](@JoiN9c9+xO0jgu0gg5yflTf+L1peLTBneFHjrKbmcKo=.ed25519) 

Just wanted to let you know that I've been thinking a lot about this post of yours. Still processing and trying to figure out what I can add, but I realized I didn't reply at all (!) so I wanted to be explicit about why. Generalizing this to problems _in general_ is a fantastic idea, but I've currently got more positive feelings than useful thoughts. ðŸ™ƒ
